verses.verse: Then Job <S%H347><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%>,
How long will ye vex <S%H3013><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>, And break <S%H1792><s%> me in pieces with words <S%H4405><s%>?
These ten <S%H6235><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> have ye reproached <S%H3637><s%> me <S%H954><s%>: Ye are not ashamed that ye deal hardly with me <S%H1970><s%>.

If indeed <S%H551><s%> ye will magnify <S%H1431><s%> yourselves against me <S%H3198><s%>, And plead against me my reproach <S%H2781><s%>;

He hath walled up <S%H1443><s%> my way <S%H734><s%> that I cannot pass <S%H5674><s%>, And hath set <S%H7760><s%> darkness <S%H2822><s%> in my paths <S%H5410><s%>.
He hath stripped <S%H6584><s%> me of my glory <S%H3519><s%>, And taken <S%H5493><s%> the crown <S%H5850><s%> from my head <S%H7218><s%>.

He hath also kindled <S%H2734><s%> his wrath <S%H639><s%> against me <S%H2803><s%>, And he counteth me unto him as one of his adversaries <S%H6862><s%>.

His troops <S%H1416><s%> come <S%H935><s%> on together <S%H3162><s%>, And cast up <S%H5549><s%> their way <S%H1870><s%> against me <S%H2583><s%>, And encamp round about <S%H5439><s%> my tent <S%H168><s%>.
He hath put <S%H7368><s%> my brethren <S%H251><s%> far <S%H7368><s%> from me <S%H3045><s%>, And mine acquaintance are wholly estranged from me <S%H2114><s%>.
My kinsfolk <S%H7138><s%> have failed <S%H2308><s%>, And my familiar friends <S%H3045><s%> have forgotten me <S%H7911><s%>.
They that dwell <S%H1481><s%> in my house <S%H1004><s%>, and my maids <S%H519><s%>, count <S%H2803><s%> me for a stranger <S%H2114><s%>; I am an alien <S%H5237><s%> in their sight <S%H5869><s%>.

Even young children <S%H5759><s%> despise <S%H3988><s%> me <S%H6965><s%>; If I arise, they speak against me <S%H1696><s%>.
All my familiar <S%H5475><s%> friends <S%H4962><s%> abhor <S%H8581><s%> me <S%H157><s%>, And they whom I loved are turned against me <S%H2015><s%>.

Have pity <S%H2603><s%> upon me <S%H2603><s%>, have pity upon me <S%H7453><s%>, O ye my friends; For the hand <S%H3027><s%> of God <S%H433><s%> hath touched me <S%H5060><s%>.
Why do ye persecute <S%H7291><s%> me as God <S%H410><s%>, And are not satisfied <S%H7646><s%> with my flesh <S%H1320><s%>?
Oh that <S%H5414><s%> my words <S%H4405><s%> were now <S%H645><s%> written <S%H3789><s%>! Oh that <S%H5414><s%> they were inscribed <S%H2710><s%> in a book <S%H5612><s%>!

But as for me I know <S%H3045><s%> that my Redeemer <S%H1350><s%> liveth <S%H2416><s%>, And at last <S%H314><s%> he will stand <S%H6965><s%> up upon the earth <S%H6083><s%>:
And after <S%H310><s%> my skin <S%H5785><s%>, even this body <S%H5362><s%>, is destroyed, Then without my flesh <S%H1320><s%> shall I see <S%H2372><s%> God <S%H433><s%>;

Whom I <S%H2372><s%>, even I, shall see, on my side <S%H5869><s%>, And mine eyes shall behold <S%H7200><s%>, and not as a stranger <S%H2114><s%>. My heart <S%H3629><s%> is consumed <S%H3615><s%> within me <S%H2436><s%>.
If ye say <S%H559><s%>, How we will persecute <S%H7291><s%> him <S%H8328><s%>! And that the root of the matter <S%H1697><s%> is found in me <S%H4672><s%>;

Be ye afraid <S%H1481><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>: For wrath <S%H2534><s%> bringeth the punishments <S%H5771><s%> of <S%H6440><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%>, That ye may know <S%H3045><s%> there is a judgment <S%H1779><s%>.
